vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.18; also called Hariph at Neh.7.24;
Also named: cha.riph (חָרִיף "Hariph" H2756H)
§ Jorah = "he instructs"
the head or ancestor of a family who returned from Babylon with Ezra
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約拉 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "他教導"
跟隨以斯拉由巴比倫回歸的一個家族的首領 (拉2:18)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约拉 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "他教导"
跟随以斯拉由巴比伦回归的一个家族的首领 (拉2:18)
